about_the_game:
Introducing AI Roguelite 2D, the world's first fully AI-generated 2D Action RPG!

Input any theme, such as "Star Wars with vampires", and an AI will generate all the lore, items, mobs, crafting recipes, animations, and game mechanics of the universe.

This game blends elements of AI Roguelite with more action-focused 2D gameplay, using a combination of initial world generation and on-the-fly story generation. Some elements such as initial location names are generated during world generation, while others such as the result of interacting with a stone monolith are generated on-demand.

Various options for text and image gen models: Choose from free cloud (works out of the box), paid cloud, or connecting a separately downloaded local model hosted on your computer (the latter requiring 5-15 minutes of setup and a GPU with enough VRAM). NOTICE: Unlike AI Roguelite original, AI Roguelite 2D currently requires an internet connection for generating the animations (even if images are generated locally).
